channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Bold Page Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Bold Page Builder

item.title: CVE-2022-2089|2024-08-03T00:24:44.232Z -- unknown -- bold%20page%20builder
item.description: The Bold Page Builder WordPress plugin before 4.3.3 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when unfiltered_html is disallowed.
